title: 01/13/21 DPS Hour 3 Chris Mannix
itunes:title: 01/13/21 DPS Hour 3 Chris Mannix
description:
Chris Mannix talks to Dan about his days a a ball boy in the NBA. Chris says that the Rockets have offers for Harden but they will maximize his value by waiting closer to the trade deadline.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
